data.title: Bitcoin (BTC) on Verge of Bullish Rebound, According to Top Analyst – Here's His Target
data.text: A closely tracked crypto strategist and trader is predicting a strong Bitcoin (BTC) bounce in the coming weeks. In a new strategy session, analyst Kevin Svenson tells his 69,000 YouTube subscribers a BTC rally is likely incoming after the top crypto asset by market cap printed nine consecutive red candles on the weekly chart. “But […] The post Bitcoin (BTC) on Verge of Bullish Rebound, According to Top Analyst – Here's His Target appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

data.title: FTX, Ripple on the lookout for acquisitions to bolster growth
data.text: FTX and Ripple, two major crypto companies, recently told CNBC they are well-capitalized enough to be on the lookout for acquisitions that would boost their growth. The post FTX, Ripple on the lookout for acquisitions to bolster growth appeared first on CryptoSlate.
